content: We always talk about one license per region policy, but in the latest publication put out by the National Health Commission back in December 2020, if I'm not mistaken, they are pretty much putting the licensing regime on hold by stating that they will not accept additional new license or they would not accept any new applications regarding new licenses for year 2021. So we are still monitoring the situation, because of all the uncertainties surrounding the cord blood banking industry regulations, we believe that it is prudent to look at opportunities outside of China, because to a certain extent, not only we need to expand our service portfolio, but we also, to the extent possible, minimize our geographical risk and China's specific regulatory risk as well.
